statements: DELETE FROM maintenance_reports WHERE car_id = 100 AND maintenance_type = 'Oil Change';
DELETE FROM car_fleet WHERE car_model = 'Toyota Camry' AND car_year < 2015;

DELETE FROM Maintenance WHERE maintenance_cost > 1000 AND maintenance_date < '2022-01-01';
